post.author: Admin
post.title: We Need Your Help for Senior Band Night!
post.description:
Hello Freshman, Sophomore and Junior Band Families!
Friday, October 7th is Senior Band Night! It
post.content:
Hello Freshman, Sophomore and Junior Band Families!

Friday, October 7th is Senior Band Night! It is an evening where the Boosters thank our senior families and our band members for everything they have done during their four years with the Marching Band .

Therefore, all senior families are unavailable to volunteer that evening so they can take the time to enjoy dinner, photos, time with family and friends and of course enjoy watching the Band!

Please consider volunteering for one of the following positions that night:

  • Concessions: Contact Dawn Rembowski: 216-990-0271
  • 50/50: Contact: Elisa Race -- 216-407-5625
  • Uniforms: Contact: Anthony Amato -- 216-401-7763
  • Hospitality: Contact Helen Kelly -- 440-746-9048

Thank you!
